abstract: Goldman Sachs, which held down executive pay last year, has no “magic formula” for setting compensation in 2010, its chief financial officer said on Wednesday.
snippet: Goldman Sachs, which held down executive pay last year, has no “magic formula” for setting compensation in 2010, its chief financial officer said on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs, which held down executive pay last year, has no “magic formula” for setting compensation in 2010, its chief financial officer said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Goldman Hasn’t Set Its 2010 Pay Plans
